title: Ten Denver Restaurant Closings in September, Twenty Openings
text:
Photo by Mark Manger Denver blog posts track comings and goings.
Related Stories Parental Advisories for Music in 2015: Pointless or Really Pointless? At our Food and Drink blog, our Cafe Society crew tracks unexpected Denver restaurant closings and more in our monthly eatery roll call.
